name: .hack: Sekai no Mukou ni+ Versus - Hybrid Pack
name_original: .hack: Sekai no Mukou ni+ Versus - Hybrid Pack
description:
.hack: Sekai no Mukou ni+ Versus - Hybrid Pack is an action-fighting game developed by CyberConnect2 Co.. It came out on 28-06-2012. Bandai Namco Entertainment published the game.
.hack: Sekai no Mukou ni+ Versus - Hybrid Pack is available on PlayStation 3.
